scripts.build: npm run optimize:images && npm run minify
scripts.dev: echo 'Development server - just open index.html in browser'
scripts.help:
echo '
Available commands:
  npm run optimize:images - Generate optimized image variants (AVIF, WebP, JPEG)
  npm run minify         - Minify CSS files
  npm run build          - Build for production (images + CSS)
'
